oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Development and processing of organic cheese products
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
Processing, packaging and transportation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Specific problems associated with hygiene of organic cheese production are conditions on farm, quality of milk and changes in cheese production. Risks of contamination of milk and products by pathogenic and spoilage bacteria are analyzed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Project} Development and processing of organic cheese products. [Luomujuustojen kehittäminen ja valmistus.] Runs 2002 - 2004. Project Leader(s): Ryhänen, Eeva-Liisa, MTT Agrifood Research Finland.
